Mozilla Stumbler Concept

UX/UI, Android, Concept

At Steamclock Software, we redesigned Mozilla’s Stumbler Android app. People use Stumbler to help develop Mozilla’s Location Services. To incentify participation, we designed an app that gamifies data collection. The app is still in production.
